outline.title: (optional.is) /required
outline.description: A small company based out of Reykjavik, Iceland specializing in future thinking projects

outline.title: (optional.is) Weeknotes
outline.description: A brief overview of what’s been happening in the company each week. The number of the weeknote is how many weeks old the company is since inception

outline.title: ◍ (optional.is) Quarternotes
outline.description: Sent quarterly, a look at what's been happening and interesting tidbits from around the Web.

outline.title: ⪮ Good Morning
outline.description: Sent monthly, 4 links, all interesting stuff, no self-promotion.
